sen.e: He made fine military achievements starting with the attack on Nagamasa ASAI of Omi Province in 1573, the Battle of Shizukatake in 1583, and the invasion of Korea after Hideyoshi inherited the unification duty after the death of Nobunaga that he was valued for his excellent political skills and assigned as Taiko-kenichi (the Cadastral Surveys by Taiko) and Kyoto Shoshidai.
